content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No permanent structures have been successfully placed on the map. Repeated attempts to construct the Lab at (0.5, 2.5)—intended for supplying Automation Science Packs for research—did not complete due to placement and resource issues. Final entity queries consistently report no built structures.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call and Parameter Handling Errors
 – When using get_entities, adhere strictly to its defined signature. Do not supply unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional parameters.
 – Validate the return value before iterating; if the call may return None, implement a fallback to an empty list.

• Lab Placement and Inventory Issues
 – Confirm that the required Lab entity exists in the inventory before attempting its placement.
 – Verify that the targeted position is available and unoccupied to avoid placement errors.

• Lab Crafting and Resource Shortages
 – Ensure all sub-ingredients for Lab crafting are producible: check that sufficient iron plates, iron-gear-wheels, copper plates, copper cables, and electronic circuits are available.
 – Prioritize resource acquisition and the smelting of requisite materials to satisfy intermediate production needs.
 – Reassess the crafting chain dependencies before initiating lab production to mitigate repeated failures due to missing ingredients.
